definition[0]: if you have a facelift, you have an operation in which doctors remove loose skin from your face in order to make you look younger
definition[1]: work or repairs that make a building or place look newer or better
example[0]: The new owner had given the pub a facelift.
definition[2]: if a building or area is given a facelift, it is cleaned and improved to make it look more attractive
example[1]: Singapore’s Raffles Hotel reopened after a facelift costing £55 million.
example[2]: San Jose’s downtown hasundergone an extensivefacelift recently.
definition[3]: if a company gives one of its products or services a facelift, it improves it and makes it more attractive
example[3]: Nissan’s six-year old supermini is due for a facelift next year.
